dict.acceptation: （表示方向）进入……中；（表示所属）输入；（表示状态）进入……状态；（表示时间）持续到；

sent.orig: A larva metamorphose into a chrysalis and then into a butterfly.
sent.trans: 幼虫变为蛹，然後再变成蝴蝶。

sent.orig: As soon as he finished reading the collect letter, he fell into a rage and tore it into pieces.
sent.trans: 他一读完那封由他付费的信，顿时大发雷霆，随即便把信撕个粉碎。

sent.orig: As soon as he finished reading the collect letter, he flew into a rage and tore it into pieces.
sent.trans: 他一读完那封由他付费的信，顿时大发雷霆，随即便把信撕个粉碎。

sent.orig: He launched into a long diatribe; She plunged into a dangerous adventure.
sent.trans: 他投入到一个长期的诽谤中；她投入一个非常危险的冒。

sent.orig: He ran into the bank and fired his gun into the air.
sent.trans: 他冲进银行，向空中开枪。
